item.description:
Okay.... this was evented...then cancelled...then discussed...then forgotten...then re-discussed...and now evented again, sooooo...

BACK BY POPULAR DEMAND!!! (The "demand" basically being ben and walter...who both better show up)

AQUA TEEN HUNGER FORCE THE MOVIE


I thought the 9:45 show time was too late but both ben and walter have individually accepted the challenge and called me a little girl in the process...personally I thought name calling was unecessary but such is the law of the jungle.

NOW WITH ADDED BONUS!!!....

Since the movie doesn't start until 9:45 and also considering what an average episode of ATHF is like it's been decided the movie may be best viewed after a drink or two (or three or four). So I'm up for meeting at the Anchor at 8:00 before making our way to the theatre at 9:45.



So the schedule is as follows...

8:00 - the ANCHOR

9:45 - the Criterion for ATHF

11:00 - ? (in this case "?" probably equals "bed")

contact - dave 203-499-7777


number one in the hood G
item.name: Back by popular demand...The Aqua Teens and ANCHOR!! For the LATE SHOW
